conversion_verification.notes: Walls clearly have height and thickness, interior volume is evident, and the view is angled. The roof is removed to expose the interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness (5). Floors clearly separate from walls (3). Interior volume is percepible (4). Proper 3D wall corner geometry (3). Angled view is good (5). Interior visible (3). Minimal perspective distortion (2). Roof cleanly removed (5). Interior spaces fully visible (3). Clean geometry (2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Rooms are correct in number (3) and adjacency (4). Relative room proportions are largely preserved (3). Major room identities match (2). Major wall positions align (5). Wall lengths are proportional (3). Internal partitions are correctly placed (2). Doors are present and on correct walls, but one is missing near the utility (3/4). Windows are present and on correct walls but not all openings are proportionally sized (1/2). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented, except for the window in the bedroom (1/2).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present in appropriate rooms, including beds, sofas, and dining table (4). Kitchen elements are present (2). Bathroom fixtures are present (2). Furniture is placed in correct rooms (3). Furniture scale appears reasonable (2). Orientation is logical (2).

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable (4). Geometry is readable and not confusing (4). Interior is clearly visible (3). Lighting does not obscure geometry (3). Materials are consistent (2). No major rendering artifacts (2). Clean background (1).

detected_errors.description: Missing door between hallway and utility area.
Bedroom window size and placement differs slightly from 2D plan.
Text labels from the 2D plan are present as cut-outs on the floor of the 3D model, causing minor aesthetic clutter.

summary: The 3D transformation is geometrically faithful, accurately representing the 2D floor plan with excellent detail and clear rendering, despite minor discrepancies in door and window placement and some residual text from the original plan.
